articles.author: Chelsea Gohd
articles.title: Hologram doctors beamed to space station to visit astronauts - Space.com
articles.description: You read that right, a hologram doctor.
articles.content:
NASA flight surgeon Dr. Josef Schmid "holoported" to the ISS in October, 2021 to visit the astronauts on board.  (Image credit: ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Thomas Pesquet)

articles.author: Antony Ashkenaz
articles.title: Solar storm sparks blackouts in Asia and Australia as earth hit by major solar flare - Express
articles.description: ON EASTER weekend, the Earth was rocked by a major solar flare that sparked radio blackouts around southeast Asia and Australia.
